1.content: Research and analyze the most valuable free APIs for enterprise automation
1.details: 1. AI/ML APIs: Hugging Face, Google AI, OpenRouter. 2. Data APIs: Alpha Vantage, OpenWeather, NewsAPI, GitHub. 3. Business APIs: Stripe test mode, PayPal sandbox, Google Maps. 4. Communication APIs: Telegram, Discord webhooks, Slack API. 5. Document APIs: Google Drive API, PDF processing

2.content: Design advanced AI-powered features using free APIs
2.details: 1. Natural language data processing with Hugging Face transformers. 2. Computer vision for document analysis (OCR, table extraction). 3. Sentiment analysis and content classification. 4. Automated report generation with AI insights. 5. Smart data validation and anomaly detection

3.content: Create real-time automation workflows with free integrations
3.details: 1. Multi-platform notification system (Slack, Discord, Telegram). 2. Automated data synchronization across services. 3. Real-time dashboard with live data feeds. 4. Event-driven automation triggers. 5. Smart scheduling and reminder systems

4.content: Build enhanced user interface with advanced features
4.details: 1. Interactive dashboard with drag-and-drop workflow builder. 2. Advanced data visualization with multiple chart types. 3. Real-time collaboration features. 4. Mobile-responsive design with progressive web app. 5. Voice commands and accessibility features

5.content: Implement enterprise-grade integrations using free APIs
5.details: 1. Google Workspace integration (Drive, Sheets, Gmail). 2. Financial data integration (Yahoo Finance, Alpha Vantage). 3. Social media monitoring and posting. 4. Project management tool integrations. 5. E-commerce and payment processing (test modes)

6.content: Deploy enhanced platform with new features
6.details: 1. Update existing Supabase backend with new APIs. 2. Deploy enhanced frontend with new UI components. 3. Implement new edge functions for API integrations. 4. Set up monitoring and analytics. 5. Create comprehensive documentation
